answers.answer: Me and you both! =-[ My breakfast today was poptarts and two kit-kat sticks.
I want pudding with a fruit roll up.    I just want this to stop lol.  Only 3 more months

I want sweets after every meal..!
I have the same problem, I crave sweets like crazy! I'm so afraid of getting diabetes haha but its just so difficult for me to eat veggies, I have to force myself.

question: Ok I want to eat nothing but sweet things :(.  This ***** because I usually eat really healthy but I don't desire anything I normally eat I just want crap food :(
title: Nothing but sweets
